import { I{{EntityName}}Repository } from '../Domain/{{EntityName}}.repository';
import {
  Get{{EntityName}}UseCase,
  Get{{EntityName}}sUseCase,
  Register{{EntityName}}UseCase,
  Update{{EntityName}}UseCase,
  Delete{{EntityName}}UseCase,
} from '../Domain/UseCases';
import { I{{EntityName}}Create, I{{EntityName}}Update, I{{EntityName}}Filter } from '../Domain/{{EntityName}}.interfaces';
import { {{EntityName}} } from '../Domain/{{EntityName}}.entity';

export class {{EntityName}}Service {
  private get{{EntityName}}UseCase: Get{{EntityName}}UseCase;
  private get{{EntityName}}sUseCase: Get{{EntityName}}sUseCase;
  private register{{EntityName}}UseCase: Register{{EntityName}}UseCase;
  private update{{EntityName}}UseCase: Update{{EntityName}}UseCase;
  private delete{{EntityName}}UseCase: Delete{{EntityName}}UseCase;

  constructor(private readonly {{entityName}}Repository: I{{EntityName}}Repository) {
    this.get{{EntityName}}UseCase = new Get{{EntityName}}UseCase({{entityName}}Repository);
    this.get{{EntityName}}sUseCase = new Get{{EntityName}}sUseCase({{entityName}}Repository);
    this.register{{EntityName}}UseCase = new Register{{EntityName}}UseCase({{entityName}}Repository);
    this.update{{EntityName}}UseCase = new Update{{EntityName}}UseCase({{entityName}}Repository);
    this.delete{{EntityName}}UseCase = new Delete{{EntityName}}UseCase({{entityName}}Repository);
  }

  async get{{EntityName}}s(filters?: I{{EntityName}}Filter): Promise<{{EntityName}}[]> {
    return await this.get{{EntityName}}sUseCase.execute(filters);
  }

  async get{{EntityName}}(id: string): Promise<{{EntityName}} | null> {
    return await this.get{{EntityName}}UseCase.execute(id);
  }

  async register{{EntityName}}(data: I{{EntityName}}Create): Promise<{{EntityName}}> {
    return await this.register{{EntityName}}UseCase.execute(data);
  }

  async update{{EntityName}}(data: I{{EntityName}}Update): Promise<{{EntityName}}> {
    return await this.update{{EntityName}}UseCase.execute(data);
  }

  async delete{{EntityName}}(id: string): Promise<boolean> {
    return await this.delete{{EntityName}}UseCase.execute(id);
  }
}
